text: Thomas Patrick McCarthy (May 22, 1884 – March 28, 1933), was a Major League Baseball pitcher from 1908 to 1909. He played for the Cincinnati Reds, Pittsburgh Pirates, and Boston Doves. ==External links== Category:1884 births Category:1933 deaths Category:Baseball players from Indiana Category:Boston Doves players Category:Charleston Sea Gulls players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Hartford Senators players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Mt. Clemens Bathers players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players
title: Tom McCarthy (1900s pitcher)
